main_desc: Drag this link into your bookmark bar and click it to get started!
percentchan: %-chan can be off due to rounding
modal_outdated_desc_1: We've released a new version of the bookmark script that features improved stability.
modal_outdated_desc_2: Please update your bookmark by removing it and adding the current version from our homepage.
modal_notes_none: There are no notes for this area
modal_launcher_desc_own: You have to be logged into Hoyolab
modal_launcher_desc_other: Only works if the account has public battle chronicle displayed
modal_launcher_loading: Once the page has loaded, click on the bookmark again to continue.
area_notes_tooltip: There {count, plural, =1 {is # note} other {are # notes}} about this area
exceeds_max_tooltip: This percentage is above the currently known maximum
stats_unavailable_desc: It appears that the user requested doesn't have their Battle Chronicle publicly available.
announcement_designFeedback_text: We've recently updated Genshin Anomaly with a new design.
